sections.heading: to 32-305. - Office of Tourism
sections.text: Connecticut Tourism Council. Tourism districts; boards of directors; budgets; coordination of activities. Tourism account. Payments received from sale of tourism advertising or products by commissioner to be deposited in tourism account. Tourism impact account. Hotel

sections.heading: and 32-307. - Transferred to Chapter 184b, Sec. 10-399(a) and (b), respectively.
sections.text: and 32-307. - Transferred to Chapter 184b, Sec. 10-399(a) and (b), respectively.
